member.name: MatrixOrder
member.summary: The MatrixOrder enumeration specifies the order of multiplication when a new matrix is multiplied by an existing matrix.

member.name: MatrixOrder.MatrixOrderPrepend
member.summary: Specifies that the new matrix is on the left and the existing matrix is on the right.

member.name: MatrixOrder.MatrixOrderAppend
member.summary: Specifies that the existing matrix is on the left and the new matrix is on the right.
